extension.summary: Creates PyDev Precdefined Completions. Based on Pydoc by nuka1195
extension.description: Creates PyDev Predefined Completions for xbmc, xbmcgui, xbmcplugin and xbmcaddon modules. Based on Pydoc by nuka1195. For those that are developing Xbmc addons using Eclipse, these will provide the ability for Eclipse to auto complete xbmc builtin modules and provide the in-IDE usage documentation. Please see http://pydev.org/manual_101_interpreter.html#id2 .
extension.disclaimer: Only potentially accurate for the version of xbmc this script was run in.
